goldensun.description: Flint will join upon leaving Vale.
goldensun.blurb: Strike a blow that can cleave stone.

lostage.description: Flint may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Strike a blow that can cleave stone.

darkdawn.description: Flint will join upon embarking on your journey.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack with a blow that can cleave stone.

goldensun.description: Forge can be found sitting on top of a cliff.
goldensun.blurb: Boost party Attack with flame's fury.

lostage.description: Forge may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Boost party Attack with flame's fury.

darkdawn.description: Forge can be found by solving a Growth puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Attack with flame's fury.

goldensun.description: Gust can be found by solving a statue puzzle underneath the town.
goldensun.blurb: Attack with mighty wind gusts.

lostage.description: Gust may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.

darkdawn.description: Gust can be obtained after entering the dungeon from a secret passage in Carver's Camp.
darkdawn.blurb: Buffet foe (perhaps twice) with gale force.

goldensun.description: Granite can be found by entering a secret passage from behind one of the houses.
goldensun.blurb: Create a mighty earthen barrier.

lostage.description: Granite may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Zephyr can be found sitting on one of Tret's branches.
goldensun.blurb: Boost party Resistance.

lostage.description: Breeze may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.

darkdawn.description: Breeze will join alongside Sveta, and will temporarily leave until Sveta rejoins the party later on.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Resistance with a gentle wind.

goldensun.description: Fever can be found in a cave after solving an ice puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Wrap a foe in feverish delusion.

lostage.description: Fever may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Wrap a foe in feverish delusion.

darkdawn.description: Fever can be found while traveling south from Carver's Camp to the Konpa Gate.
darkdawn.blurb: Damage and delude a foe with a heat haze.

goldensun.description: Fizz will join alongside Mia.
goldensun.blurb: Restore HP with calming water.

lostage.description: Fizz may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Sleet can be found behind one of the waterfalls.
goldensun.blurb: Drench a foe to drop its attack.

lostage.description: Sleet may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Drench a foe to drop its Attack.

darkdawn.description: Sleet will join alongside Rief.
darkdawn.blurb: Slash a foe with ice to reduce its Attack.

goldensun.description: Zephyr can be found after solving a log puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Boost party Agility with swift wind.

lostage.description: Zephyr may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Boost party Agility with swift wind.

goldensun.description: Quartz can be found after solving a log puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Revive a downed ally.

lostage.description: Quartz may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Mist can be found after making an NPC drop their water and using Frost to create a passage.
goldensun.blurb: Lull a foe into deep sleep.

lostage.description: Mist may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Lull a foe into deep sleep.

darkdawn.description: Mist will join alongside Amiti.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack and lull a foe into deep sleep.

goldensun.description: Corona can be found to the north of Xian.
goldensun.blurb: Boost party Defense with a heat aura.

lostage.description: Corona may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Boost party Defense with a heat aura.

goldensun.description: Spritz can be found after solving a minecart puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Restore party HP with soothing mist.

lostage.description: Spritz may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Restore party HP with soothing mist.

goldensun.description: Smog can be found hidden by Reveal.
goldensun.blurb: Veil a foe's vision in smoke.

lostage.description: Smog may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Veil a foe's vision in smoke.

goldensun.description: Vine can be found to the west of Lamakan Desert.
goldensun.blurb: Tangle foes to drop Agility.

lostage.description: Vine may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.

darkdawn.description: Vine can be found hidden and running around a field of grass.
darkdawn.blurb: Tangle multiple foes to drop Agility.

goldensun.description: Scorch can be found by entering the Kalay Tunnel and solving the water puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Stun a foe with a blast attack.

lostage.description: Scorch may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Stun a foe with a blast attack.

goldensun.description: Sap can be found by ringing the bell on top of the tower and then using Reveal to enter a secret tunnel.
goldensun.blurb: Attack a foe and steal HP.

lostage.description: Sap may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Attack a foe and steal HP.

goldensun.description: Kite can be found after using Lift to enter Vale Cave in Vale, using the newly-obtained Halt psynergy to catch the djinni.
goldensun.blurb: Attack twice next round.

lostage.description: Kite may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.

darkdawn.description: Kite can be found after traversing through an underground tunnel hidden underneath a pillar.
darkdawn.blurb: Allow an ally to take an extra action.

goldensun.description: Ember can be found in a corner in Tolbi, after using psynergy to create a passage to it.
goldensun.blurb: Restore party PP with passion's flames.

lostage.description: Ember may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Restore party PP with passion's flames.

goldensun.description: Hail can be found to the north of Tolbi and to the west of Altmiller Cave.
goldensun.blurb: Freeze a foe to drop its Defense.

lostage.description: Hail may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Freeze a foe to drop its Defense.

goldensun.description: Ground can be found by walking around the Karagol Sea from Tolbi and entering the back end of Kalay Docks.
goldensun.blurb: Use gravity to hold a foe.

lostage.description: Ground may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Use gravity to hold a foe.

goldensun.description: Squall can be found after solving a fallen pillar puzzle.
goldensun.blurb: Paralyze a foe with a storm.

lostage.description: Squall may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Paralyze a foe with a storm.

goldensun.description: Tonic can be found after obtaining the Cloak psynergy and talking to Donpa after clearing the Lunpa Fortress.
goldensun.blurb: Heal all party ailments.

lostage.description: Tonic may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Flash can be found by using Reveal to uncover a secret passage.
goldensun.blurb: Block damage to party with a firewall.

lostage.description: Flash may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Block damage to party with a firewall.

goldensun.description: Dew can be found by dropping off the correct part of the cliff.
goldensun.blurb: Revive a downed ally.

lostage.description: Dew may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Prox after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Torch can be found by jumping across the rooftops.
goldensun.blurb: Penetrate defense with a melting blast.

lostage.description: Torch may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Magma Rock after Isaac's party joins.
lostage.blurb: Penetrate defense with a melting blast.

goldensun.description: Luff can be found after falling down a particular ledge.
goldensun.blurb: Seal a foe's Psynergy.

lostage.description: Luff may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in SW Atteka Islet after Isaac's party joins.

goldensun.description: Bane can be found by solving the puzzle on the sixth floor of Crossbone Isle.
goldensun.blurb: Attack with nature's venom.

lostage.description: Bane may join with Isaac's party. If data is not transferred or this djinni was not found in Golden Sun, they may instead appear in Treasure Isle after Isaac's party joins.
Echo will join upon exiting Daila to the south.
Fog can be found after obtaining Lash by going back into the dungeon.
Breath can be found after obtaining Lash, by chasing it deeper into the shrine.

darkdawn.description: Breath can be found after obtaining the Arid Heat psynergy and using the lilypad to reach it.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore an ally's HP before others can act.

lostage.description: Cannon can be found after chasing it throughout the dungeon and solving a Pound puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Strike with the power of Mars.

lostage.description: Zagan can be found in a cave west of the Dehkan Plateau.

darkdawn.description: Zagan can be found after solving a Whirlwind puzzle after entering from the eastern side of the dungeon.
darkdawn.blurb: Earth's might enflamed.

lostage.description: Iron can be found in the forest to the immediate west of Madra.
Blitz can be found by solving a Pound puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Numb a foe with a lightning strike.

lostage.description: Flora can be found by solving a Whirlwind puzzle inside of Air's Rock.
lostage.blurb: The wind rider, goddess of flowers.

darkdawn.description: Flora can be found after obtaining the Cold Snap psynergy, dropping down some cliffs from the top of the dungeon, and solving a Zol cube puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: The wind rider, goddess of flowers.

lostage.description: Ether can be found by talking to Master Maha during the day after obtaining Reveal.

darkdawn.description: Ether can be found in the forest to the west of Kaocho.
darkdawn.blurb: Focus will to restore PP.

lostage.description: Spark can be found by using Scoop to uncover an underground tunnel.
lostage.blurb: Revive an ally with cheers of support.

lostage.description: Sour can be found in a patch of land to the northeast of Mikasalla.
Megaera can be found in a cave northeast of Mikasalla by solving the Scoop puzzle.

darkdawn.description: Megaera can be found after solving a Douse puzzle in a cavern outside the Konpa Ruins.
darkdawn.blurb: The goddess of vengeance.

lostage.description: Kindle can be found towards the Gondowan side of the Gondowan Cliffs.
Chill can be found by heading west from the Gondowan Cliffs.
lostage.blurb: Strike to reduce a foe's defense.

darkdawn.description: Chill can be found by climbing down into the canyon.
darkdawn.blurb: Shatter a foe's defense with numbing cold.

lostage.description: Spring will join alongside Piers.

darkdawn.description: Spring can be found in a cave near the water after solving a log puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore HP with healing springwater.

lostage.description: Shade will join alongside Piers.
Steel can be found by falling down the correct gear.
lostage.blurb: Siphon a foe's HP with a kiss.

darkdawn.description: Steel can be found by using Grip to traverse to the western side of the town's northwestern stream and jumping over lilypads.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack and siphon a foe's HP with a kiss.

lostage.description: Waft can be found after Piers joins the party and solving a Frost puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Calm a foe with soothing scents.

darkdawn.description: Waft will join alongside Sveta, and will temporarily leave until Sveta rejoins the party later on.
darkdawn.blurb: Smite and lull a foe to sleep with aromas.

lostage.description: Char can be found by giving an old couple a Healing Fungus.
lostage.blurb: Paralyze foes with a strong blow.

lostage.description: Moloch can be found by reaching the depths of Madra Catacombs using Reveal and Frost.

darkdawn.description: Moloch can be found in a cavern in the mountains after solving a Fireball and Cold Snap puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: The sacred ice monster.

lostage.description: Mud can be found by solving a Cyclone puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Slow a foe with sticky mud.

lostage.description: Flower can be found by maneuvering through the air spout puzzle in the main cavern.

darkdawn.description: Flower can be found after using Whirlwind on a field of flowers.
darkdawn.blurb: Refresh allies and restore HP.

lostage.description: Steam can be found after obtaining the Parch psynergy inside of Aqua Rock.
Coal can be found after completing Gaia Rock by handing the Dancing Idol to Uzume.
lostage.blurb: Rally your allies to boost Agility.

lostage.description: Ulysses can be found by using Reveal to enter an underground tunnel and using the Sand psynergy.

darkdawn.description: Ulysses can be found to the west of Border Town, reached by walking all the way north and around, after solving a minecart puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: A legendary wandering mage.

lostage.description: Haze can be found by using Sand to descend to the lower cliffs of the falls.

darkdawn.description: Haze will join alongside Sveta, and will temporarily leave until Sveta rejoins the party later on.
darkdawn.blurb: Hide away to avoid damage.

lostage.description: Wheeze can be found in a small area of land to the south of Tundaria Tower.
lostage.blurb: Poison a foe as you strike.

lostage.description: Reflux can be found in the basement after solving an ice puzzle.

darkdawn.description: Reflux will join alongside Eoleo.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost counterattack rate.

lostage.description: Meld can be found after gaining access to the Islet Cave from the Sea of Time Islet and completing a log puzzle. Reaching Islet Cave requires completing a fetch quest involving the miscellaneous islands in the Great Eastern Sea.
Eclipse can be found by scoring the center of the Lemuria Spring Lucky Medal minigame.
lostage.blurb: A dragon whose wings span the skies.

darkdawn.description: Eclipse can be found after interacting with the object at the top of the tower.
darkdawn.blurb: A dragon whose wings span the skies.

lostage.description: Rime can be found by using Grind to reach a new part of Lemuria after exiting the first time.

darkdawn.description: Rime can be found after sliding off the roof of a house.
darkdawn.blurb: Seal a foe's Psynergy.

lostage.description: Core can be found to the west of Contigo, reachable from the western shores of Hesperia.
Petra can be found in a forest to the northeast of Shaman Village, reachable from the northern shores of Atteka.
Tinder can be found after completing a box puzzle.

darkdawn.description: Tinder can be found after using Slap on a sleeping man and walking on top of the boats.
darkdawn.blurb: Revive a downed ally without fail.

lostage.description: Gel can be found after completing an ice puzzle.
Aroma can be found after completing Trial Road and climbing through one of the houses.
Salt can be found by using Scoop in the center of a bunch of leaves.
Whorl can be found by solving a Hover puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Take a deep breath, and strike!

lostage.description: Shine can be found by using Force on a stump (requires data transfer).
Geode can be found by using the Lift psynergy on a rock.
lostage.blurb: Strike with a clod of earth.

darkdawn.description: Geode will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack with a clod of earth.

lostage.description: Coatlicue can be found after obtaining the Wings of Anemos and flying to the southern end of Atteka.
lostage.blurb: A goddess bearing the water of life.

darkdawn.description: Coatlicue can be found by filling a channel with water, entering the Harun Channel, and going south until finding a cave entrance.
darkdawn.blurb: A goddess bearing the water of life.

lostage.description: Eddy can be found by solving the Lift puzzle.
Gasp can be found towards the end of Trial Toad after obtaining the Hover and Lift psynergy.
lostage.blurb: Call the Grim Reaper on your foes.

lostage.description: Haures can be found in a cavern in western Angara, north of Loho, after obtaining the Carry psynergy.

darkdawn.description: Haures can be found after using a Dream Leaf at the inn and climbing over to the Bilibin side of town.
darkdawn.blurb: A beast that sunders darkness.

lostage.description: Fury can be found after lowering the lava level.
lostage.blurb: Call forth wandering souls to attack.

darkdawn.description: Fury can be found by solving a Fireball puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Call haunting spirits to harm your foe.

lostage.description: Lull can be found after blowing up a wall using the Magma Ball from Magma Rock.

darkdawn.description: Lull can be found after obtaining the Search psynergy and using the whirlwind on the ocean to enter Otka Island.
darkdawn.blurb: Negotiate a temporary cease-fire for a turn.

lostage.description: Mold can be found by using Scoop on a pile of snow on the ice.
Balm can be found by solving an ice puzzle.
Fugue can be found after heating the ice in Mars Lighthouse.
lostage.blurb: Fatigue your foes to drop their PP.

darkdawn.description: Fugue can be found hanging on a tree fruit.
darkdawn.blurb: Fatigue your foes to drop their PP.

lostage.description: Gale can be found by solving a Lift puzzle.
lostage.blurb: Blast enemies with a wind strike.

lostage.description: Azul can be found after defeating the Star Magician.
lostage.blurb: An awakened dragon from the deep.

darkdawn.description: Azul can be found after obtaining the Search psynergy and defeating the Star Magician.
darkdawn.blurb: An awakened dragon from the deep.

lostage.description: Crystal can be found after obtaining the Teleport psynergy and solving a Pound puzzle.
Daedalus can be found after defeating Valukar.

darkdawn.description: Daedalus can be found after obtaining the Sol Blade and defeating the Ogre Titans.
darkdawn.blurb: Master craftsman of ancient times.

lostage.description: Serac can be found after obtaining the Teleport psynergy and interacting with a statue.

darkdawn.description: Serac can be found by solving an ice puzzle and dropping down to a lower floor.
darkdawn.blurb: Strike a chilling finishing blow.

lostage.description: Catastrophe can be found after defeating the Sentinel.

darkdawn.description: Catastrophe can be found after obtaining the Sol Blade and defeating the Ancient Devil.
darkdawn.blurb: The embodiment of destruction.

lostage.description: Charon can be found after obtaining the Teleport psynergy and gathering all 72 djinni.
lostage.blurb: The boatsman of the river Styx.

darkdawn.description: Charon can be found after finishing the game and reaching the depths of Crossbone Isle.
darkdawn.blurb: The boatman of the river Styx.

lostage.description: Iris can be found after defeating Dullahan.
lostage.blurb: Goddess of rainbows, guide of souls.

darkdawn.description: Iris can be found after finishing the game and defeating Dullahan.
darkdawn.blurb: Goddess of rainbows, guide of souls.

darkdawn.description: Jolt can be found at the top of the dungeon after obtaining the Grip psynergy.
darkdawn.blurb: May revive a downed ally with sharp shocks.

darkdawn.description: Cinder can be found by climbing the walls of the city through a building.
darkdawn.blurb: Usually revives down ally with life embers.

darkdawn.description: Bark can be found after traversing through most of the interior of the dungeon behind a whirlwind spout.
darkdawn.blurb: Create a protective barrier against attacks.

darkdawn.description: Surge can be found by solving a Arid Heat puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore party HP with a stream of life.

darkdawn.description: Mellow will join alongside Amiti.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Resistance with a moist sheen.

darkdawn.description: Claw will join alongside Amiti.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack to drop an enemy's Resistance.

darkdawn.description: Lava can be found after giving a man a Kaocho Dumpling.
darkdawn.blurb: Drop enemy Defense with volcanic gases.

darkdawn.description: Vortex can be found after solving a Zol cube puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack and delude a foe with whirling air.

darkdawn.description: Brand can be found after using the Sol Mask in the Alchemy Forge, climbing the town's new walls, and jumping down a cliff.
darkdawn.blurb: Lock enemy Psynergy with low failure rate.

darkdawn.description: Brick can be found after obtaining the Cold Snap psynergy, climbing the walls of town, and entering a building from its roof.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Defense with a hard covering.

darkdawn.description: Doldrum can be found by solving a Grip and Fireball puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Stop enemy movement with still air.

darkdawn.description: Dewdrop can be found after using Fireball and giving the fisherman the Trusty Staff.
darkdawn.blurb: Cure party status effects with fresh dew.

darkdawn.description: Fleet will join alongside Sveta, and will temporarily leave until Sveta rejoins the party later on.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Agility with wind at your back.

darkdawn.description: Bolt will join alongside Sveta, and will temporarily leave until Sveta rejoins the party later on.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack and stun a foe with electric force.

darkdawn.description: Torrent can be found at the docks after solving a box puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Agility with a surge of energy.

darkdawn.description: Spout can be found behind an entrance to the ruins behind a set of bookshelves in Belinsk.
darkdawn.blurb: Spray foe with painful, blinding mists.

darkdawn.description: Gears can be found to the north of Border Town.
darkdawn.blurb: Force a foe to attack another.

darkdawn.description: Sirocco can be found after solving a Grip puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Scour and delude a foe with a sandstorm.

darkdawn.description: Furrow can be found on an island to the west of Port Rago.
darkdawn.blurb: Drain an enemy's HP.

darkdawn.description: Coral can be found after solving an Arid Heat puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore party HP with the life-giving seas.

darkdawn.description: Garland can be found hidden among the upper tree branches of town.
darkdawn.blurb: Refresh an ally and restore HP.

darkdawn.description: Glare can be found after solving a log puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Damage and delude a foe with heat glare.

darkdawn.description: Wisp can be found after obtaining the Crush psynergy and solving a Move puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore party PP with refreshing fragrances.

darkdawn.description: Pewter will join after meeting with Tret and Laurel.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack with molten metal through defenses.

darkdawn.description: Teardrop can be found behind a waterfall after solving a Crush puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Usually revive a downed ally with grieving.

darkdawn.description: Puff can be found by jumping down a cliff from the summit discovered by using Crush.
darkdawn.blurb: Inflate an enemy to bursting.

darkdawn.description: Chasm can be found after solving a Crush puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Send damage the party takes to the void.

darkdawn.description: Pincer can be found after solving a Cold Snap puzzle in one of the residences after Eclipse Tower.
darkdawn.blurb: Pinch enemy to drop its Resistance.

darkdawn.description: Crystallux can be found after fighting off the monsters at the opera house during the Grave Eclipse.
darkdawn.blurb: A dragon with a heart of brilliant crystal.

darkdawn.description: Wrath will join alongside Eoleo.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack with force that may knock foe out.

darkdawn.description: Chili will join alongside Eoleo.
darkdawn.blurb: Stun and injure a foe with explosive force.

darkdawn.description: Glow will join alongside Eoleo.
darkdawn.blurb: Revive a downed ally with near certainty.

darkdawn.description: Stoke will join alongside Eoleo.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Attack with a call to victory.

darkdawn.description: Chain can be found in a tree after raising the three watchtowers.
darkdawn.blurb: Entangle a foe so each ally can attack.

darkdawn.description: Sizzle can be found to the east of Yamata City after walking around the mountain.
darkdawn.blurb: Damage and drop a foe's Defense with heat.

darkdawn.description: Buckle will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Boost party Defense with a protective shell.

darkdawn.description: Clover will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore allies' status to normal.

darkdawn.description: Magnet will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Stun a foe with sudden force.

darkdawn.description: Pepper will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Attack and stun a foe with unbearable heat.

darkdawn.description: Swift will join alongside Himi.
darkdawn.blurb: Use speed of the wind to strike first.

darkdawn.description: Shell can be found behind a waterfall after solving a Grip puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Shield allies from damage with a hard shell.

darkdawn.description: Geyser can be found after sliding down a snowy hillside.
darkdawn.blurb: Blast an enemy with a waterspout.

darkdawn.description: Foam can be found in a forest shrouded by the Grave Eclipse to the southwest of Tonfon.
darkdawn.blurb: Reduce foes' Agility with tidal disturbance.

darkdawn.description: Flare can be found by solving a Thermal puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Restore party PP with a psychic flare-up.

darkdawn.description: Simoom can be found on the largest of the several deserted islands to the south of Angara.
darkdawn.blurb: Scourge foe with a poisonous wind.

darkdawn.description: Ivy can be found after finding the Old Rag and delivering it to the NPC in the inn.
darkdawn.blurb: Turn an enemy to stone.

darkdawn.description: Hemlock can be found after solving a teleportation puzzle.
darkdawn.blurb: Use ominous flora to doom all enemies.

darkdawn.description: Aurora can be found while solving the puzzle in the Venus area.
darkdawn.blurb: Speed party Djinn recovery with Sol's light,
